website_summaries.verdict: This is a sturdy juicer that earns points for its wide feed tube.
pros: This sturdy machine has a wide chute that can handle larger pieces, which translates into less prep work
It has a small footprint and an attractive design
cons: This one is harder to clean than some of its competitors and may leave more pulp in the juice

customer_reviews.title: YESS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It is just what we needed in our studio cabin. We don't have a lot of storage space, so the horizontal storage is perfect for us. All the parts are easy to clean and stack together nicely when not using. We juice a lot of celery and love that we are not heating up the nutrients too much. Along with this product being just what we needed, the company selling it has been really helpful with tips on how to use and checking in to make sure we were satisfied. I would recommend this juicer to anyone looking for a space saving, quiet, and quality juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less cutting and more output
customer_reviews.text: Greater juicer for my need. Easy to clean up and more output than my omega masticating juicer. The wide chute can take in a whole apple (not gigantic size) and that saves tons of cutting needed by the omega.
customer_reviews.author: Automatic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is easy to clean, easy to assemble, and take apart. Pulp is dry, and very-little-to-no pulp in juice. Still, I do strain it before drinking. I cut hard root vegetables like carrots, red beets, ginger, turmeric, etc. into smaller pieces, or slices before feeding into auger chute. This is our second SKG juicer, and this one has some improvements, as well as fewer parts and pieces to clean. Overall, I believe this is a good choice, and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Heathman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good juicer
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Leaves alot of pulp. Have to strain. Gets clogged easliy. Little juice output. Will now purchase a different one.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cummins

customer_reviews.title: BAM! WHAT!
customer_reviews.text: dang this thing is awesome, clean up is easy.... set up is easy..... enjoying the amazing freshly squeezed juice this thing provides .. TOO EASY!!! pulp comes out very dry , the mouth chute is a good size, you can't fit a whole apple inside but you cut it in two 4 pieces and your good to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Metal_vega

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you run the pulp back through
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction and quality of materials. It's not difficult to clean, but does take a bit of time to rinse and dry all the parts. I purchased it primarily to juice celery. The celery pulp is not exactly dry, so I run it back through after juicing. For example, after juicing enough celery to get 20 ounces of juice, running the pulp back through adds another 4 ounces of juice, which is about 20 more. It only takes another 3-4 minutes to do, but I wonder if this would be necessary with the more expensive units. Since this was most I wanted to spend on a juicer, I'll likely keep it.
customer_reviews.author: kps2008

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for leaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our home and as soon as I used the machine it leaked celery juice in between where the container lays on top of the base. At first I thought maybe I'm doing it wrong, or im.not closing the little rubber piece in where the shout is for easy clean up, so I choose to try again and figure it out but nope same problem every time. And. Is it just broke under a year randomly making celery juice. I'm very upset.
customer_reviews.author: MMaldonado❤

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: So I waited to post this review to see how it did for the first 20+ juices. So far I love it. It is way simpler to clean and presses well. The only downside is that you will need to skin most of the fruit and celery strings tend to get caught in it but who really wants celery anyways. I enjoy it and the easy cleaning makes it much less of a hastle. Once you get used to it you can clean it in about 2-5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Celery burned out the motor.
customer_reviews.text: Motor burned out with juicing celery very sporadically over past 6 months. I just replaced the metal juicing cylinder and wouldn’t you know, I only got two days of use with it. The metal cylinder gums up from the celery. The greener and more fibrous celery is more difficult to juice and must’ve put a strain on the motor. I am really bummed and I hope to purchase a juicer that performs better for celery. Any recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: K. Hill

customer_reviews.title: if you like pulpy drinks
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace a high speed juicer, this does produce more juice but also produces way more pulp. if you don't like pulpy drinks then I highly recommend getting a good strainer, which reduces your overall juice output. 16 oz of juice strained leaves you with roughly 10 oz of non pulpy juice.
customer_reviews.author: Warren C.

customer_reviews.title: The juicer didn't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after seeing a lot of great reviews on it and watching endless videos of how great this product was. I received it today. I washed it, dried it, and followed the instructions to put it together, but when I turned it on and nothing happened. It didn't turn on at all. I will not be reordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had purchased this and raved about its performance. After they showed me how easy it was to use and clean, I was sold and bought this for myself. Have been using this for about 2months every other day and no complaints! Just make sure the rubber plugs are inserted correctly otherwise juice will spill all over machine (learned that the hard way). Another added bonus is their customer service team- answered my questions quite promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini8787

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with this brand of juicer. I have been juicing for over 40years and I love it. Very easy to use and clean up. The only drawback is that, I do get small food particulars mixed in with the juice when I juice a lot of ingredients at once. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Good recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Frist day using and love it right away . Strong powerful and great working.
customer_reviews.author: Luan pham

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I got this one because its size and look as I wanted to leave it on the counter...plus it had good reviews. I use it daily and I'm happy with it. I have nothing to compare it but am please I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: DAE

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed on the cleaning part specially when juicing celery because the fiber gets stuck all the time and I have spend more time removing them so I have to cut the celery into an inch size for easy cleaning BUT it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Mamai

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is everything I expected. I’ve put fruits, vegetables, herbs into it. It is quiet and produces a tasty drink. It is easy to clean except for one part. There is a rubber part at the pulp extractor that catches stuff and it is not easy to clean. The cleaning tool is helpful but it’s still hard to clean out. Other than that, I’m very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: lkb

customer_reviews.title: Diffcult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for short time and one of the seals is leaking. Would not recommend. Have contacted SKG by email (no phone number to call) and have not received any thing back from them. Stay away from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Clean immediately after use!
customer_reviews.text: Would not start when I pressed on switch, my son had to come over and work on it, then it made a horrible screeching noise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great, effective Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective juicer. It is a bit bulky to assemble and is not dishwasher safe so cleaning takes a while but i'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Son-Jai paik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Compact Machine, Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Machine is easy to use & clean, seems quite powerful & extracts a lot of juice from vegetables that seem 'dense' & 'low on moisture'. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used almost every day this product for months and works excellent. Good quality, easy to use and clean. The product worth the cost. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edi

customer_reviews.title: Works good on fruits and hard veggies
customer_reviews.text: Chute is sometimes hard to clean since it has cup that tips over. Also has some issues with leafy greens, but overall good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me!The juice squeezed out is very fresh and the taste is delicate.Better than the juicer I bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does celery !
customer_reviews.text: Great product first juicer we wanted masticating because we are juicing celery and this product can handle the 16 oz my wife and I are drinking every morning . So far perfect.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works great
customer_reviews.text: Flavorful juice. Dry pulp. I bit of a pain putting it together. But, awesome. I suggest to put spinach together with another vegetable like celery. It helps get the juice out better. It also juices garlic! That is amazing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit difficult to clean but I really love everything else about it. Juice is actually much more flavorful than my old centrifugal juicer. I’ve had it a few weeks now and I definitely like it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It died
customer_reviews.text: First - the design is poor. Feeder tube is too small for carrots, so you have to chop them up. It doesn't like celery at all. Too bad, because I do. The flippy cup feeder is useless, as others have pointed out. And last - it worked 3 times, then died. I am returning it and starting my research all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: After buying a cheaper juicer that didnt last but 6 months, I splurged on this model. It is easy to clean and the noise is a lot less than previous juicers I have owned. Would highly recommend this model
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Street

customer_reviews.title: Shakes while juicing
customer_reviews.text: This juicer shakes when its juicing. Inhave tried reassembling it many times thinking maybe something is loose, but no difference. I am.scared it's going to stop working one day all of sudden.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it was worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud and the juice has a ton on pulp, it's more like a crunchy juice, I have to strain my juice several times to get the bits out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November of 2019. Have only used it about 3 or 4 times. It quit working today, June 12, 2020. Smells like the the motor burned out. No return possible, no product support available.
customer_reviews.author: William Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and it still works like a charm. Produces quite a bit of pulp so I have to put strainer over container collecting juice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Reker

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 prior to this one and to be honest this is the better one so far easy to use and very efficient hopefully will last a long time unlike the 2 prior ones that I had before.
customer_reviews.author: paco

customer_reviews.title: Stops working very easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product a handful of times and it’s already not functioning. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset, I have two pieces that broke, it’s still within the warranty timeframe, I have emailed three times with no response back. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is a good one no problem so far ever I got it a week ago so far it has been good, it’s easy to clean, easy to disassemble, and it’s quiet I enjoy making juice in the morning get it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Girlucarne Jean

customer_reviews.title: use it every day
customer_reviews.text: love it works well . I would recommend this to my friends and family...
customer_reviews.author: Kris Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Besides it’s a good machine
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece that attaches to the body of the machine comes out and has a defect
customer_reviews.author: natou

customer_reviews.title: Love my new juicer.
customer_reviews.text: It looks intimidating at first but is actually very easy to use, has a sleek design and extremely quiet. The juice quality is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value juicer highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and efficient juicer that leaves very dry pulp - great quality juice. Compares favorably to the much more expensive Huron model.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: With this juicer, you can put large chunks if vegetables or fruit in, so it takes less time to preoare. Also very easy to clean and assemble
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lebow

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome machine! I use two or thee times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer.... we use for fruits and veggies both and it works great....the wide mouth allows full fruit like a whole apple to go in... very less prep needed....
customer_reviews.author: V. K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it Everything we were looking for in a juicer
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a boss the first month. Then the week after it can't be returned the auger stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, powerful and quick. Easy to use and makes delicious juice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine . I’m recomment this . Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Loan Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Ever since it has arrived I have been juicing away.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: SKG JUICER
customer_reviews.text: Okay I gave this 3 stars only because its okay, I am a big juicer person, had 3 previous, As far as this one goes, I wouldn't recommend putting whole fruits and veg, without cutting up in smaller pieces even though it says you can, if you are looking for juicing more veg, & greens this is not the juicer for you! takes longer and can Easley gam up. As far as the cleaning goes, this one is easier, and easier to put back together, This on does make the juice taste better if your looking for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Grab a couple of pounds of carrots a sleeve of celery and put that through the juicer-save the pulp and a couple of cups of cold water or chicken stock and create your own vegetable stock. After you juice the carrots and celery add 4 apples and a lime to the juicer and you end up with a great tasting and healthy drink.
customer_reviews.author: James O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, fast, barely there pulp. Great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer! -The pulp comes out so dry. No pulp. -Cleaning is easy - its very quiet and fast What I didnt like is: -The swing bowl at the top to drop food in is terrible. The leaves get stuck and it’s just not functional. Would be better to just be open. - The bowl for juice has no handle so it’s hard to hold. Overall: The juicer juices well, leaves dry pulp and the juices taste good! For the price, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: ACroG

customer_reviews.title: Not good for celery juicing
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to juice celery and it just getting the pulp stuck and it was hard to open an clean. I returned it :(
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent juicer. I worried about the plastic blades but it’s holding up well. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. I’m not sorry I got it. Seller is very communicative
customer_reviews.author: Thisismyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this juicer! Easy to use and clean. And it doesn't sound as loud as our last one either.
customer_reviews.author: Kalex

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I use to make apple juice . This makes the best juice i had. If you want to save money and be healthy get a juicer. I wish it had a better opening to put produce in
customer_reviews.author: Louis C. Golden

product_meta.title: SKG Q8 Wide Chute Vertical Masticating Juicer 45 RPM BPA Free Anti-oxidation Easy to Clean - Red
feature_bullets: 🍎 EASE OF USE - The 3.15 inches turn-over cup allows fruits and vegetables to be entered the juicer easily regardless of size.
🥝 KEEP MORE NUTRITIOUS - Prevents the rapid oxidation which could be caused by the high-speed spinning of a centrifugal juicer.
🥕 MORE FLAVORFUL JUICE - SKG Q8 Juicer extract more juice (Orange 70%, Pear 81.3%, Apple 78%, Celery 80.5%, Carrot 55%).
🥒 EASY TO (DIS-) ASSEMBLE AND CLEAN - Takes only a few simple steps to assemble and be designed to efficient cleaning process.

🎁 SUPERIOR QUALITY BUILD - All working parts are made of high quality food grade anti-oxidation materials with 2 years warranty. If you are not satisfied with the prodcut and want to return the prodcut, please contact us firstly through E-mail, we try our best to help you. Many thanks ahead!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
